summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided. It includes multiple entries for shipments made by Epstein, with specific dates and amounts due. The invoice highlights discounts applied and provides instructions for payment and adjustments.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 5-917-74485, dated September 10, 2001.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $177.77.
The invoice includes multiple entries for shipments with specific dates and amounts.
Discounts totaling $17.61 were applied to the invoice.
The document contains instructions for payment and adjustments related to FedEx services.
